Justia Legal Jobs Newsletter

Hello,

Welcome to the latest issue of the Justia Jobs newsletter. A couple of brief notes:

If you apply for one of these jobs please indicate that you learned about it via Justia.

If your organization is hiring you can contact us at legaljobs@justia.com for details on how your job can be included in the next issue.

Feel free to share this newsletter. New subscribers can sign-up here.

If you have any feedback or suggestions you can contact us at legaljobs@justia.com.

Best,
Justia Legal Jobs
